sn55.19:4.3: as easily as a strong person would extend or contract their arm,
sn55.19:4.5: vanished from Jeta’s Grove and reappeared among the gods of the Thirty-Three.
sn55.19:4.6: Then several gods of the company of the Thirty-Three went up to Venerable Mahāmoggallāna,
sn55.19:4.7: bowed, and stood to one side.
sn55.19:5.1: “Reverends, it’s good to have experiential confidence in the Buddha. …
sn55.19:5.4: It’s the reason why some sentient beings, when their body breaks up, after death, have been reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm.
sn55.19:5.5: It’s good to have experiential confidence in the teaching. …
sn55.19:5.7: and to have the ethical conduct that’s loved by the noble ones …
sn55.19:5.9: It’s the reason why some sentient beings, when their body breaks up, after death, have been reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm.”
